name: keep-awake
description: Keep your PC awake while you're away! Prevents system idle with automated mouse movements.
author: Ketan-K

scripts.build: npm run clean && if not exist dist mkdir dist && "C:\Program Files\AutoHotkey\Compiler\Ahk2Exe.exe" /in keep-awake.ahk /out dist\keep-awake.exe /bin "C:\Program Files\AutoHotkey\Compiler\Unicode 64-bit.bin" /icon keep-awake.ico
